issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: __IPHONE_VERSION_MAX_ALLOWED will not work when compiling to lower OS versions

comments.body:
{html}

(from [af4085dc179465209e5c7cf7f2866321d6fb9e30]) [#1099 state:open] Fixes so that the status bar shows/hides correctly under 3.1. http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/af4085dc17946...

{html}

{html}

(from [cbff41c5d97032dd01fc75e3d1b4de25d40ee2c5]) Closes #1099: Added +[TiUtils isiPhoneOS3_2OrGreater] to test for a selector in 3.2 that is not in earlier versions. Combined with the #ifdef code this should be sufficent. For now, methods which will only work in 3.2 or later throw an exception when running on earlier devices. http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/cbff41c5d9703...

{html}
